document_data.title: Scream of Stone
document_data.author: [[Philip Athans]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Scream of Stone''''' by [[Philip Athans]] is the third book in the [[Watercourse trilogy]].

{{quote|''When the true mission of the [[Thay]]an Enclave is revealed, the richest man in [[Innarlith]] decides he wants to be the most powerful too, a once promising young man is transformed into a twisted [[undead]] [[assassin]], and a quiet genius finally makes his stand, the explosive fury of decades of boiling rage explodes from the heart of a city at war with itself.''}}
